quoteText: If you violate these terms, Kolab Systems AG may seek to rectify the situation, including suspension and/or discontinuation of your account. We will aim to be fair and proportionate. Also, Kolab Systems AG reserves the right to take measures belatedly against violations even if we decided to take no immediate measures.
title: Suspension will be fair and proportionate

tosdr.case: User suspension from the service will be fair and proportionate.
